description: Documentation for 6.15. Stream Ordered Memory Allocator

files.title: CUresult cuMemAllocAsync (CUdeviceptr *dptr, size_t bytesize, CUstream hStream)
files.summary: Allocates memory with stream ordered semantics....

files.title: CUresult cuMemAllocFromPoolAsync (CUdeviceptr *dptr, size_t bytesize, CUmemoryPool pool, CUstream hStream)
files.summary: Allocates memory from a specified pool with stream ordered semantics....

files.title: CUresult cuMemFreeAsync (CUdeviceptr dptr, CUstream hStream)
files.summary: Frees memory with stream ordered semantics....

files.title: CUresult cuMemGetDefaultMemPool (CUmemoryPool *pool_out, CUmemLocation *location, CUmemAllocationType type)
files.summary: Returns the default memory pool for a given location and allocation type....

files.title: CUresult cuMemGetMemPool (CUmemoryPool *pool, CUmemLocation *location, CUmemAllocationType type)
files.summary: Gets the current memory pool for a memory location and of a particular allocation type....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolExportPointer (CUmemPoolPtrExportData *shareData_out, CUdeviceptr ptr)
files.summary: Export data to share a memory pool allocation between processes....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolExportToShareableHandle (void *handle_out, CUmemoryPool pool, CUmemAllocationHandleType handleType, unsigned long long flags)
files.summary: Exports a memory pool to the requested handle type....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolGetAccess (CUmemAccess_flags *flags, CUmemoryPool memPool, CUmemLocation *location)
files.summary: Returns the accessibility of a pool from a device....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolGetAttribute (CUmemoryPool pool, CUmemPool_attribute attr, void *value)
files.summary: Gets attributes of a memory pool....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolImportFromShareableHandle (CUmemoryPool *pool_out, void *handle, CUmemAllocationHandleType handleType, unsigned long long flags)
files.summary: imports a memory pool from a shared handle....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolImportPointer (CUdeviceptr *ptr_out, CUmemoryPool pool, CUmemPoolPtrExportData *shareData)
files.summary: Import a memory pool allocation from another process....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolSetAccess (CUmemoryPool pool, const CUmemAccessDesc *map, size_t count)
files.summary: Controls visibility of pools between devices....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolSetAttribute (CUmemoryPool pool, CUmemPool_attribute attr, void *value)
files.summary: Sets attributes of a memory pool....

files.title: CUresult cuMemPoolTrimTo (CUmemoryPool pool, size_t minBytesToKeep)
files.summary: Tries to release memory back to the OS....

files.title: CUresult cuMemSetMemPool (CUmemLocation *location, CUmemAllocationType type, CUmemoryPool pool)
files.summary: Sets the current memory pool for a memory location and allocation type....
